settings.footer_text: Rooted in ancient wisdom, cultivating modern wellness. Honor your body's natural intelligence through the timeless science of Ayurveda.

settings.subtitle: Potent by Nature · Minimal by Design
settings.description: Nature’s Botox: Potency without the excess. We’ve captured the transformative power of traditional Ayurveda in one intentional step. By stripping away fillers and artificial preservatives, we leave only 100% pure, cold-pressed organic oils that your skin can actually use. Handcrafted with a commitment to high-quality ingredients and a plastic free footprint, our formula is a clean sanctuary for your skin and a purposeful commitment to zero-waste.

settings.title: Pure Results. Zero Noise.
settings.description:
At the heart of our craft is Nature’s Botox, a one step Ayurvedic face oil designed for those who value potency over the noise of a ten-step routine.

By stripping away synthetic fillers and artificial preservatives, we’ve left only 100% pure, cold-pressed organic oils—nutrients your skin actually recognizes and absorbs. Handcrafted with a commitment to high-quality ingredients and a plastic free footprint, our formula is a clean sanctuary for your skin and a purposeful commitment to zero-waste.

settings.testimonial_text: Pure magic. It has softened my fine lines and made my skin feel more supple than creams twice the price. My skin just looks healthier and I constantly get compliments now. I'll never be without it!
